99-0479 (La. 4/1/99)

Oray Paul SAVOIE, Sr. and Maxie Savoie v. HARMONY CENTER, INC., Tommy Mason Community Home, Sherry Knox and Erica Barrie. No. 99-CC-0479. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Essex Insurance Company;. — ■ Other(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of East Baton Rouge 19th Judicial District Court Div. *561“D” Number 443599; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, Number CW98 2108

Denied.

JOHNSON, J. not on panel.
